'''1.21.6 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.6-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first and only [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.6]], released on June 12, 2025,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-6-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.6 Release Candidate 1|June 12, 2025}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.6 Release candidate 1
|;dev
|298022|Not signed Books and Quills with an overflowing new line at the bottom do not depict the pages' contents.
|298633|Happy Ghast gets you stuck in blocks while riding and gets stuck in blocks upon dismount.
|298658|Locator Bar shows inaccurate positions after respawn.
}}</onlyinclude>
